name: Kotatsu
description:
Kotatsu

Play as a cat who's never left his home. Go outside and discover what the world is like! You will explore new environments, meet other animals, and learn their way of living. Jokes intended.

This game was done for the Global Game Jam.

Kartre: art
Girafe: sound, writing
KardEroc: dev, writing
uj: dev, writing, sound
